result.execSummary:
The defendant Celeste Eve Scales was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Scales Cases called: 15CM743 & 16CM102, Defendant Celeste Eve Scales in court with attorney Ronald Gabriel Benavides.  Troy D Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Statement by Atty. Defendant stood mute, Court entered not guilty pleas, jury trials to be set.
